{{zh-forms|s=旧|alt=旧}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|雈|臼|c1=s|c2=p|t1=owl|ls=psc}}.

Originally referred to a type of owl; later borrowed for a homophonous word meaning "old." The upper portion frequently appears as {{zh-l|*萑}}.

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[old]]; [[former]]; [[past]]
#* {{zh-x|他 重獲 舊 職。|He got his '''former''' job back.}}
#* {{zh-x|你 的 新 房子 和 你 的 舊 房子 比 起來 怎樣？|How does your new house compare with your '''old''' one?}}
# [[old]]; [[used]]; [[worn]]
#* {{zh-x|地 毯 舊 了，但 還 能 用。|The carpet is '''worn''' but still serviceable.}}
#* {{zh-x|我 在 閣樓 上 有 好幾 箱 舊 衣服。|I've got boxes of '''old''' clothes in the attic.}}
